traits.name: Bladed Hide
traits.desc: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 5 (2d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The moorbounder’s long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.

actions.name: Blades
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.
